title: Norms champ select system FLAWED
body:
Hi there,

Myself and my friend, are having on going annoying issues about the current method for calling lanes in Normal Summoners Rift, the current system is flawed, needs to change, to many players joining: 
a. Late 
b. And not calling quick enough 

and then 
a. Can't see earlier calls and think they are right 
or 
b. Do not CARE, and lock in there champ anyway (even if other summoners agree that a person didn't get that lane)

It is putting a huge dampener on our game play experience, especially when we are the ones who are getting 15 minute + bans for not selecting champs, because we are to confused at what lanes people are going!

I believe that the ranked lane selection needs to be implemented into norms, that way a third party is choosing the lanes for all the players, so there is no confusion as to who got the right lanes, this way also if someone doesn't go that lane they are allocated, they can be reported and since the server allocated a lane to the players, Riot can see that they were allocated e.g MID for that match, and ban the crap out of them because this is getting to much to deal with.

It is working for ranked and although Norms is no ranked, it still can use the same champ select system to help improve the overall league experience for more then just me and my friend.

Let's make norms GREAT AGAIN cause it's really pissing us off!

Thanks for reading,
Millsy128

"I am the will of man unbound by flesh." - Xerath

replies.body: Just play Solo or Flex then... Sure you may care about Solo Queue, but not many people care about Flex unless they're a pre-made team.

Hi there,

I do see what your saying, but we shouldn't be made to bend to accommodate for the people who don't care and troll in Norms, even if it is norms, not all people feel there skillful enough to try ranked.

Cheers,

Millsy128
Would be nice if more people thought that way, then you wouldnt get the perma feeding

> I believe that the ranked lane selection needs to be implemented into norms,

Ranked lane call is flawed as well, because it essentially makes it that there is only 1 way to ever play the game, which is just bad on almost all levels hence why I've been avoiding the Ranked like a plague. At least in Norms I get _some_ chances arguing whether or not we could go unconventional, while with the Ranked queue format there is simply none.

I'd rather the return of Teambuilder queue or Draft queue than either of those things discussed.

When Flex queue was announced OCE was promised that Normal Blind Pick would be deleted and replaced with Normal Flex.

But obviously it will never happen.
There's no point complaining because Riot wont do anything to fix it.
I have to disagree with the op, sorry. It's not flawed, it's completely screwed up. A flawed system would be an improvement :P

I remember reading something about how they were working on this, actually! Or at least thinking about it? I don't remember the details of it, but anyway, apparently they're working on something that combines the role preference thing in draft, and the short champion select of blind. So what that sounds like to me is they're probably gonna bring assigned roles to blind, which I can't wait for, personally.
Yes exactly what I want, replace blind pick altogether if we can't have both, I'm so sick of having to call lane in chat ITS A BROKEN SYSTEM EITHER FIX IT OR GET RID OF IT
